title: Wolves Among Danes
description: A young princess is forcefully taken from her home by wild and savage Vikings, but this group of Vikings are indeed the beasts townspeople have described them to be.They might be raiding kingdoms for their riches, but more accurately, they are looking for a good hunt to satisfy their raging bloodlust come the full moon.Along the way, young Ellie finds herself in a bind. A powerful and scary man of whom she has previously stabbed on the fateful day of her kidnapping, declares her to be his future wife for reasons she does not know.Is this perhaps his revenge or something elseâ€¦?
author: Dolly Nightmare
